Example: Shadow Bias Analysis Workflow

Source: R/margot-shadow-examples.R
example_shadow_bias_analysis.Rd

This example demonstrates the complete workflow for analyzing how observational shadows affect causal effect estimation.

Usage

example_shadow_bias_analysis(n = 1000, seed = 2024, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

n

Sample size (default 1000)

seed

Random seed for reproducibility

verbose

Print progress messages

Value

A list containing the simulation results and bias analysis

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Run the example
results <- example_shadow_bias_analysis()

# View the bias comparison
print(results$comparison)
} # }
